hymn.title: Send Thou, O Lord, to every place

layout.singingstanza: Send Thou, O Lord, to ev -- ery place Swift mes -- sen -- gers be -- fore Thy face, The her -- alds of Thy won -- drous grace, Where Thou Thy -- self wilt come.

lyrics.stanza: Send Thou, O Lord, to every place Swift messengers before Thy face, The heralds of Thy wondrous grace, Where Thou Thyself wilt come.
Gird each one with the Spirit's sword, The sword of Thine own deathless word; And make them conquerors, conquering Lord, Where Thou Thyself wilt come.
Raise up, O Lord the Holy Ghost, From this broad land a mighty host, Their war-cry, We will seek the lost, Where Thou, O Christ, wilt come!
